Articles.Content:
I am sure I saw this somewhere but where can I find a list of the altitude ranges for low and high orbits of bodies?

I have tried google, forum, wiki searches etc, this info seems to be missing!

Anyone know of a link to a place with this info?

Thanks.

Edited October 10, 2014 by nine_iron
http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Science#Celestial_body_multipliers has the info you are looking for.

Perfect! I knew it was around somewhere, just not under the expected headings.

Ta bro.
